title: Boost Your Farm's Productivity with Affordable Rice Transplanting Machines!

tasks.task: Rice farming involves physical demands such as transplanting seedlings and using farming equipment.
subtasks: Operating a walk-behind or riding-type transplanter.
Troubleshooting common issues with the transplanter.
Checking for subsidies on farm equipment.
Participating in training programs for new equipment.
